scripts.start-dev: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & nodemon index.js
scripts.build-js: browserify src/js/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs -mc > client/build/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify src/js/app.js -o client/build/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] -dv
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
